lighter machine learning models.with: heavily data - reliant deep learning models

compare.from sentence: In this work , we explore the implication of hand - crafted features for SER and compare the performance of lighter machine learning models with the heavily data - reliant deep learning models .

combine.from sentence: Furthermore , we also combine features from the textual modality to understand the correlation between different modalities and aid ambiguity resolution .

extract.from sentence: For both the approaches , we first extract handcrafted features from the time domain of the audio signal and train the respective models .

first approach.from sentence: In the first approach , we train traditional machine learning classifiers , namely , Random Forests , Gradient Boosting , Support Vector Machines , Naive - Bayes and Logistic Regression .

second approach.from sentence: In the second approach , we build a Multi - Layer Perceptron and an LSTM classifier to recognize emotion given a speech signal .
